title: Isekai de Skill wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa no Structure
description:
[b][i]A harem cheat fantasy with super-enhanced slaves![/i][/b]

When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world, Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave, a wife, and a cheat!

[hr]
[b][u]Portuguese / Português: [/u][/b][spoiler]Quando um ônibus cheio de pessoas é invocado para outros mundo, Nagi Souma não segue a ideia de ser um herói como os outros. E assim ele deixa o palácio e começa sua vida num outro mundo com sua habilidade de reestruturar habilidades.[/spoiler]

[hr]
